.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_INFO_2
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL`
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-format-parameter]] pname:format must: be a valid elink:VkFormat value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-type-parameter]] pname:type must: be a valid elink:VkImageType value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-samples-parameter]] pname:samples must: be a valid elink:VkSampleCountFlagBits value
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-usage-parameter]] pname:usage must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageUsageFlagBits values

* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatInfo2-tiling-parameter]] pname:tiling must: be a valid elink:VkImageTiling value
